channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Survival Of Adriana Smith’s Baby Upsets Democrats, Media More Than Her Death
item.description: If reading about a black female in Georgia whose passing was exploited to attack pro-life protections sounds familiar, that’s because it is.

item.title: Trump extends TikTok deadline a third time
item.description: President Trump has extended the deadline for the Chinese-owned app TikTok to divest its U.S. assets a third time since taking office in January.

item.title: The Horseshoe Coalition Against Israel on Iran
item.description: The ‘restrainer’ right and the progressives sound an awful lot alike on Israel and Iran — but they are on the margins.

item.title: The Wrong Way to Build a Nuclear Renaissance
item.description: The real bottleneck to nuclear progress in America isn’t a lack of federal financing.

item.title: Trump calls Jerome Powell 'dumb' and 'destructive' after Fed decision
item.description: President Trump on Thursday labeled Fed Chair Jerome Powell an "American disgrace" after the central bank refused to cut interest rates one day earlie...

item.title: No Matter How Much The Left Wants To Riot, Americans Still Support ICE And Want Deportations

item.title: Saying Goodbye to Julia Alexander
item.description: Memories of an art-world star and cherished friend.

item.title: Sorry, Democrats: Republican Work Requirements Are Modest — and Empowering
item.description: Able-bodied adults on welfare are capable of lifting up themselves and America. What a shame that Democrats refuse to see it.

item.title: What Sports Can Teach America About Swift Justice
item.description: Athletes have a code, one that’s missing on social media and in politics.

item.title: Democrats Will Turn Every Illegal Alien Trump Doesn’t Deport Into A Voter
item.description: Given the chance, Democrats will choose voter registration over deportation.

item.title: U.S. Attorney Chased By Illegal Alien With Knife In Albany
item.description: Criminal behavior is what we can expect from people who started their relationship with this country by entering illegally.

item.title: U.S. Navy Sails To 2025 Recruiting Target Three Months Ahead Of Schedule
